data.title: Napoleon Total War Online Battle #15 (3v3) - Smoking gun
data.description:
Welcome to another glorious Napoleon Total War battle.  This is a large 3v3 pitch battle with some awesome factions :D  Enjoy! 
_
Visit my Website & Podcast!

Thanks to this awesome community I built a website for Total War fans, gamers, and history nerds.  It has blog posts, a Podcast, and a forum.

The Round Table (Podcast-itunes): https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/round-table-total-war-gaming/id1012071205?mt=2

*Be sure to give the podcast 5 Stars :D
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to send me Battle Replays!

This video will show you how to send me battle replays :D https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nG3uZoDkCU
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play Medieval 2 Total War & Rome Total War Online!

Gamespy Servers are down, but there is still hope.  Thanks to CA and steam you can still play the game online

How to play Online: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YGfItCMitPg
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why do I block out the Mini-Map with annotations for Sub battle replays?

I block it out because the Mini-Map gives away who sent in the battle replay.  And in most cases whoever sends in the battle replay wins the battle.  So I block it to keep it a surprise :D  

_

data.title: Arnor Answer the Call! - Third Age Total War (2v2 Online Battle #17)
data.description:
Welcome back to Third Age Total War.  Isengard with the help from Rhun is attacking the Iron Hills.  The helpless dwarves send messengers all through the land, but only one Kingdom will help answer their call for aid.  The Kingdom of Arnor!  Arnor sends an strong army to aid the dwarves in a time of need.  Men and Dwarves will forge a great alliance that will stand against any Evil in Middle Earth.

Third Age is a Mod for Medieval 2 Total War!

Medieval 2 Total War: http://store.steampowered.com/app/4700/

Third Age Mod Download: http://www.moddb.com/mods/third-age-total-war

Jackie Fish: https://www.youtube.com/user/Jackiefishhhhhh

data.title: The Walls Run Red! - Medieval 2 Total War - Teutonic Siege - (3v4 Online Battle #249)
data.description:
We just made it in time for another huge siege battle in the Teutonic Expansion.  Teutonic Order, Scotland, and Norway defiantly hold a red clay Citadel.   And the Holy Roman Empire, Denmark, Egypt, and Novgorod try to take it for their own through force.  We are about to witness a massive collision of  professional armies on Medieval 2 Total War.  Enjoy :D

data.title: Breaking the Meta - Medieval 2 Total War (1v1 Online Battle #250)
data.description:

data.title: Pepper Them Down! - Breaking the Meta #1 (1v1 Medieval 2 Total War)
data.description:

data.title: FIGHT FOR THE IRON HILLS - Third Age Total War
data.description:
Battle of Iron Hills
The Orcs of Gundabad attempted a major conquest of the Iron Hills hoping that the dwarven forces were still recovering from after the battle of the five armies. Dain despite being outnumbered 3-1 said "lets just kill em" and lead his forces in a night march .Reaching the Orc Encampment during the early hours of the morning, whilst the orcs and goblins where starting to get drowsy, readied there armies and marched on the camp.After all, they are only mere orcs and what are they ,compared to a dwarf....

data.title: 30k Subs Thank You! - Minas Tirith Custom Battle Scenario
data.description:
Thank you guys for all the Support!  To show appreciation I have here the Siege Battle of Minas Tirith!  Download it and play with your friends!  Send me the replay and I will make a video of the best one :D 

RULES for BATTLE:

- If Attackers reach the 3rd layer of the settlement they win.  The Defenders must destroy the attackers to win.

- The First reinforcement force to be able to join the fight is Rohan.  They must wait 15mins once the battle starts before they can charge in.

- After Rohan Charges in, the Mumakil can charge in 3 mins after. (NOTE they can not enter the city.  Just not physically possible).

- After the Mumakil charge in, the Ghost army must wait 5mins then they can join the fight.

DOWNLOADS:
SINGLE PLAYER: http://www.mediafire.com/download/6tqr0e3993hzu5a/minas_sp.rar
